content.raw:
I’m just going to remove the pretense of Python 2 support. We had one last labscript system that was still running python 2 that I thought needed the support, but I just updated them instead.

As for merging, I want the other experiment to do a bit more soak testing with some real shots. Now that they are back from DAMOP, it hopefully won’t be much of a wait.
content.html:
I’m just going to remove the pretense of Python 2 support. We had one last labscript system that was still running python 2 that I thought needed the support, but I just updated them instead.

As for merging, I want the other experiment to do a bit more soak testing with some real shots. Now that they are back from DAMOP, it hopefully won’t be much of a wait.
